citation: Proclamation under the Electricity Companies Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electricity Companies Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Electricity Companies Act 1997 â€“

        (a) fix 21 April 1998 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, other than sections 1, 2, 24, 25, 26 and 27 and Schedules 2 and 3, commence; and
        (b) fix 1 July 1998 as the day on which section 26(1) and (2) of that Act commences.
21 April 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

T. JOHN CLEARY

Minister for Energy

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 April 1998

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
